post.description:
Adds sender information in middleware remittance system by
 Sending addSender message to PayQuik Storing sender
 information in bancs table (PQRM)
 Sender is identified using SenderID
 generated by PayQuik.

 Channels must retrieve customer profile to
 capture customer name either in
 Arabic or English and customer must
 fill the missing name (either in
 Arabic or in English). Customer also
 must provide other information
 in English.

sender.description:
Repetitive Record contains sender elements
						below

sourceAmount.description: Total amount in account currency to be deducted from the account

destinationAmount.description: Net transfer amount in destination currency

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate from source currency to destination currency

customerLimit.description: customer balance in Remittance service (including this request money amount) in SAR

pickupCode.description: Pickup Code needs to be presented by the recipient when picking up the money at the pickup location (only applies for deliveryType = PICKUP)

quickPayReferenceNumber.description: Unique ID, assigned by PayQuik, that uniquely identifies in the PayQuik system a money transfer transaction

bankReferenceNumber.description: unique number that identifies a money transfer transaction, must be presented to the customer

journalId.description: BANCS journal number for the deduction transaction

journalGL.description: BANCS journal number for the deduction transaction

mgReferenceNumber.description: MG Reference for MoneyGRam DDEPOSIT and COURIER transaction

payQuikRefNumber.description:
Unique ID, assigned by PayQuik, that uniquely identifies in the PayQuik system a money
						transfer transaction

statusId.description: Status Identifier as received from PayQuik

statusMessage.description: Status message as retrieved from PayQuik

sourceAmount.description: Net transfer amount in account currency (fee is excluded)

destionationAmount.description: Net transfer amount in destination currency

samaStatus.description: SAMA Status can have below possible value     1. ACTIVE    2. DORMANT   3. UNCLAIMED   4. ABANDONED  5. CLOSED

DeliveryType as MONEYGRAM PICKUP, 
 	MONEYGRAM DDEPOSIT, MONEYGRAM COURIER

 	 MONEYGRAM DDEPOSIT, MONEYGRAM COURIER
